title: User Bars Font
content:
I´m working on a proyect and I need to know what is the font that they use in this bar from [www.userbars.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080919172806/http:/www.userbars.com/ "www.userbars.com")

[http://www.userbars.com/galerie/images/files/3/4/google.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080919172806/http:/www.userbars.com/galerie/images/files/3/4/google.gif "http://www.userbars.com/galerie/images/files/3/4/google.gif")

 [‹ Old-Fashioned Decorated Serif, Kinda Western](http://web.archive.org/web/20080919172806/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16517 "Go to previous forum topic") [Viktoria und ihr Husar concert poster ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080919172806/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16549 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tebo

comments.content: The text Google or the one on the right side?

the one on the right side :P

Tebo - Argentina

What a strange thing.

According to the tutorial [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20080919172806/http:/www.tutorialtomb.com/forum/showthread.php?t=317/) he used “Visitor BRK”

Richard
BRK is used by Brian Kent of Aenigma. Looks like the Visitor [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20080919172806/http:/www.aenigmafonts.com/fonts/fontsv.html) is it.
